definition: Zouping county in Binzhou 濱州|滨州[Bin1 zhou1], Shandong
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
Zouping county in Binzhou 濱州|滨州[Bin1 zhou1], Shandong

sentences.english: Zouping County is in the Song Dynasty to the growth of well-known statesman Fan Chung-yen.
sentences.chinese: 鄒平縣是宋代著名政治家范仲淹的生長地。

sentences.english: Finally, taking Zouping County as an example, a concrete plan for developing circular economy is made in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 最後以鄒平縣爲例，做一個發展循環經濟的具體規劃。
